name: Last Summer Day
description:
[OBJECTIVE]

Its the last day of summer, so why not have some fun? Your job is to collect the leaves that fall from the tree and prepare for the fall season. Becareful, as you know the more fun you have, the quicker time flies by!

[CONTROLS]

A/D movement

[CREDITS]

Unity Asset - Free Pixel Font: Thaleah - TinyWorlds
